XII.i.3.C.1.a
.
Awarding DIC Benefits to a Child(ren) Before a Determination of Surviving Spouse Entitlement
If determination of a potential surviving spouse’s Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) entitlement will be unduly delayed in a claim involving children, award DIC benefits to the child or children if and when entitlement can be established.
Reference
:  For more information on rates, see the current
DIC rate charts
.
